DOC.brief_summary: Phase 3 , open-label, randomized study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the Lilly/Alkermes inhaled insulin system compared to injected insulin in type 1 and type 2 diabetes patients with asthma or COPD. Patients will be treated for 12 months with a 2 month follow up period.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Inhaled Insulin in Patients With Diabetes and Asthma or COPD
DOC.criteria: Type 1 or type 2 diabetes asthma or COPD Current smoking habit
